docTitle.titlePart:
Profile-Guided Optimization with
Microsoft Visual C++ 2005
Visual Studio .NET 2003

front.div:
Summary: Discusses profile-guided optimization in Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 (formerly known as
Visual C++ "Whidbey"), a powerful new feature that will allow applications to be tuned for actual
customer scenarios. Real-world performance gains of over 20% are not uncommon. (13 printed
pages)
